titles.title: How beauteous were the marks divine

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, who like Thee, so calm, so bright, So pure, so made to live in light? Oh, who like Thee did ever go So patient through a world of woe?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O, who like thee so humbly bore The scorn, the scoffs, of men before? So meek, forgiving, godlike, high, So glorious in humility?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, in Thy light be mine to go, Illumining all my way of woe! And give me ever on the road To trace Thy footsteps, Son of God!{/lang-eng}
